description: Defines an abstract class 'DataSource' that specifies methods for managing vehicles, groups, and events, acting as a contract for data operations in the fleet management system.

classes.name: DataSource
classes.description: An abstract class that declares methods for initializing data storage and CRUD operations for vehicles, groups, and events.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the underlying storage system or seeds initial data.

methods.name: getVehicles
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Vehicle objects.

methods.name: deleteVehicle
methods.description: Deletes a Vehicle by its ID.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.description: Retrieves a list of BusinessGroup objects.

methods.name: deleteGroup
methods.description: Deletes a BusinessGroup by its ID.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Retrieves a list of MaintenanceEvent objects.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Deletes a MaintenanceEvent by its ID.
